document.full_text: names of all 2,982 people who died in the september 11 attacks will be grouped as friends, work buddies and families on bronze panels at a national memorial opening in new york, organizers announced.
document.title: names at september 11 memorial grouped as family, work buddies
lines_and_colors: names of all 2,982 people who died in the september 11 attacks will be grouped as friends, work buddies and families on bronze panels at a national memorial opening in new york, organizers announced.
